segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Green . Please have a seat . I received your resume last Monday and I would like to say I ’ m very impressed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I asked why you are interested in working for us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company has an impressive reputation . My uncle worked for your company for many years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , did he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but he retired 5 years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you mind telling me a little bit about your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m a senior broker in a large company . I deal with clients on a daily basis , handling all aspects of their accounts personally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you are the right candidate for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do think I am the right candidate for this position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you think you ’ re the right candidate for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have a lot of experience in this area . I have all the qualifications you need . I enjoy working with people . In my current job , I ’ m in charge of a team of eight people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you might be the person we ’ Ve been looking for . Do you have any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , if I were hired , when would you like me to start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At the end of this month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And how many accounts would I handle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ ll be supervising six brokers who manage a combined total of 310 accounts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of benefit package do you offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two weeks of paid vacation in your first year of employment . You ’ re also eligible for medical and dental insurance . And we offer a generous retirement pension plan after 10 years of service . Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ ll have to discuss your application with my colleagues , and we ’ ll get back to you early next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . It was very nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was nice to meet you , too . And thanks for coming in today .
segments.speaker: S1
